title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Technology-Enhanced Blended Learning for Anatomy and Radiology

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify normal and pathological X-ray images and correlate them with anatomical structures.
Learners can apply radiologic knowledge to clinical contexts to interpret patient symptoms.
Learners can self-directly construct an anatomy review system using mobile-based TELT (Technology-Enhanced Learning Tools).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
